name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zhongli and Xiao Lantern Rite Gameograf

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing glow of the Lantern Rite Festival with Zhongli and Xiao, two iconic figures from Genshin Impact!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celebrate the beauty and tradition of Liyue Harbor as Zhongli and Xiao come alive in this breathtaking live wallpaper. The serene night sky, adorned with floating lanterns, illuminates the bond between the Geo Archon and the vigilant Yaksha. Perfect for fans of Genshin Impact, this wallpaper captures the magic, reverence, and heartwarming atmosphere of the Lantern Rite Festival, making every new tab an enchanting experience.

Key Features
🏮 Dynamic Lantern Animation: Watch as glowing lanterns float serenely in the background.
🧙‍♂️ Zhongli & Xiao Centerpiece: A visually stunning depiction of the beloved characters amidst the festivities.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Conveniently built in for seamless browsing.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Elegantly integrated for utility and style.
🔗 Customizable Shortcuts: Quickly access your favorite websites with ease.
🔗 Extension Management Links: Find “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” options in the bottom-left corner.

Celebrate the Lantern Rite Festival with Zhongli and Xiao, and let their presence light up your browsing experience with this stunning live wallpaper!
